The Main class serves as the entry point for the application.
Main() - Constructor for class Launcher.Main
 
Material - Class in Core.Materials
The Material class represents the visual properties of an object in the scene, including ambient, diffuse, and specular colors, reflectance, and an optional texture.
Material() - Constructor for class Core.Materials.Material
Constructs a Material with default properties: ambient, diffuse, and specular colors set to Constants.DEFAULT_COLOR, reflectance set to 0, and no texture.
Material(Texture) - Constructor for class Core.Materials.Material
 
Material(Vector4f, float) - Constructor for class Core.Materials.Material
Constructs a Material with a single color for ambient, diffuse, and specular components, a specified reflectance, and no texture.
Material(Vector4f, float, Texture) - Constructor for class Core.Materials.Material
Constructs a Material with a single color for ambient, diffuse, and specular components, a specified reflectance, and a texture.
Material(Vector4f, Vector4f, Vector4f, float, Texture) - Constructor for class Core.Materials.Material
Constructs a Material with separate ambient, diffuse, and specular colors, a specified reflectance, and a texture.
Model - Class in Core.Entities
The Model class represents a 3D model with an ID, vertex count, and associated material.
Model(int, int) - Constructor for class Core.Entities.Model
Constructs a new Model with the specified ID and vertex count.
Model(int, int, Material) - Constructor for class Core.Entities.Model
Constructs a new Model with the specified ID, vertex count, and material.
Model(Model, Texture) - Constructor for class Core.Entities.Model
Constructs a new Model by copying an existing model and assigning a new texture.
MOUSE_SENSITIVITY - Static variable in class Core.Utils.Constants
The sensitivity of the mouse for camera control.
MouseInput - Class in Core.Managers
The MouseInput class handles mouse input, including cursor position, button presses, and displacement vector.
MouseInput() - Constructor for class Core.Managers.MouseInput
Constructs a new MouseInput instance with initial values.
movePosition(float, float, float) - Method in class Core.Managers.Camera
Moves the camera's position by the specified amounts along the x, y, and z axes.
moveRotation(float, float, float) - Method in class Core.Managers.Camera
Moves the camera's rotation by the specified amounts around the x, y, and z axes.
